name: logforge
tagline: A lightweight self-hosted log management service
description: LogForge is a lightweight and fast self-hosted log management service that provides real-time monitoring and querying of application logs through a modern web UI. It integrates easily with Docker and cloud-native environments.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Real-time monitoring, Query logs, Modern web UI. Lightweight log aggregation

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Container logs, Easy setup, Cloud-native. Perfect for containerized apps

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Efficient storage, Quick queries, Low overhead. Handle logs without slowdown

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Privacy-focused, Custom deployment, Full control. Own your log data

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Custom alerts, Notification channels, Threshold monitoring. Stay informed of issues
